lead_paragraph: ISAACSON--Leonard A. The members and staff of the law firm of Feder Kaszovitz LLP mourn the passing of Leonard Isaacson, friend, partner, mentor and accomplished counselor. Rest in peace Lenny. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ISAACSON, LEONARD A
